summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5630 for the improvement of 46th Avenue South, from Genesee Street to Bradford Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74312 as amended by Ordinance No. 74342, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
